long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make control of your media consumption with this transparency assessment extension. Designed to evaluate the credibility of media outlets in Kosovo, the tool analyzes three essential criteria: registration with the Kosovo Business Registration Agency (KBRA) or as an NGO, membership in key media councils (IMC or KPK), and the presence of critical website sections like editorial details, contact information, and an 'About Us' page. Outlets are categorized into green, yellow, red, or black lists, making it easy to identify trustworthy sources. By promoting transparency and accountability, this tool empowers users to make informed decisions and supports the development of higher standards in journalism.
